# removeToken(at:)

**Instance Method**

Removes a particular search token from the search text field.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func removeToken(at tokenIndex: Int)
```

## Parameters

- **tokenIndex**: Within the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISearchTextField/tokens] array, the index of the token you want to remove.

## Adding and removing tokens

- **tokens**: The collection of tokens in the search text field.
- **insertToken(_:at:)**: Adds a search token at a specific index.
